title: language_test_4_8
prompt:
What is the best way to complete blank 8?

Volcanoes form when magma, molten and semi-molten rock beneath the Earth’s surface, rises and ![dropdown:Drop_Down_716_95] a rupture in the crust.
feedback: The correct answer is "leaks through." The sentence should read: “Volcanoes form when magma, molten and semi-molten rock beneath the Earth’s surface, rises and leaks through a rupture in the crust.” This question asks you to choose the correct commonly confused words. The word “leak” means to accidentally or unusually go through or out of a container. The word “leek” is a kind of vegetable. The correct word is “leak,” since the magma is moving out of the Earth’s containing crust. The word “through” means moving in one side and out the other, while the word “threw” is the past tense of “to throw.” The correct word is “through” since the magma is moving in one side of the crust and out the other.
